name: One Level Per Day
description:
Controls: A/D move left/right. W move up, but only when moving right.

Goal: Reach the right side of the screen to get a point, repeat endlessly

As a challenge to myself, as I am working on writing a game in C++, I want to upload one version of the game per day. The idea is that each iteration has some improvement or addition to the gameplay.

As this is the first day, it's not very good. Please let me know if it doesn't run. WINDOWS ONLY
